Description.value: Mod that removes POIs, roads, traders, books, schematics, along with lots of items but adds in some fun things as well. A modified version of Three Thirty's RWG files were used. Also removes all but a few and adds specific loot from enZombies - More Server Side Zombies https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/24594-enzombies-more-zombie-variations/ and Snufkin Custom Zombies PLUS, Community zombies built into the Snufkin Custom Zombies Mod, oakraven and arramus (Snufkin for base mod), https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/22698-snufkins-custom-server-side-zombies-plus/
